title: Please nerf
body:
Ahri, Yi, Blitz, Brand, Cho, Diana, Darius, Ezreal, Gangplank, Draven, Irelia, Katarina, Leblanc, Malphite, Morgana, Riven, Yasuo and Zed.

I'd explain why, but it's pretty obvious.

replies.body: 110% of what you do with your life is complain about how OP champions are. Stop. Please.

Couldn't agree more. Sick of people complaining about certain champions. If it's not a champion it's an item, if it's not this it's that. Can't you just play the game. If you don't like it... don't play??!?!?!?
Oh no, you were beaten by someone better than you. Must be time to CRY

Nah I'm on a 20 game lose streak because I haven't been counterpicking and it annoys me that I can't play a variety of Champions that aren't my mains and counterpicks I usually play against certain champions as the strongest contenders with and against certain teams - I stopped playing these main counterpicks and synergy picks because I got bored of maining certain champions and it cost me Gold2 - Silver 3 because the main champs I take are the strongest all around picks for and against certain teams and there aren't really any replacements that work that well so while im bored of certain champs, picking a different champion with a similar counter mechanic doesn't work out because their ratios and stuff suck and everyone just mains like Zed, Yasuo and Vayne, Yi, Ahri and Kalista and Braum, Leona and Thresh or Cho, Wukong, Riven or Xin jungle, Lee Jungle and Warwick and Shyvana and I see these picks sooooooooooo often and if you try to play a similar champs like Yorick or something it becomes problematic because even though in theory they might synergize and counter a champ well his ratios and stuff really suck and he's only really good with a very specific team comp or game plan or against certain teams and with certain teams but synergizes less wide-spreadly with and against a smaller range of teams.

So many champs need buffs and all Riot is doing is nerfing OP Champs so the mid range and low range champs stay at the same ratio of power...

ahem, I will now log on just to say that again.

Because skarner can be agreed on when he was released, these people have been fine for awhile and no one has complained, If they were that bad, riot would have done something (like they did to skarner) to those champs, and imo ahri is still really weak

(better nerf irelia)

You should play bots for a while and learn the key points to this game if you are on a 20+ losing streak.

You win once you destroy there nexus.
pls nerf champions they i got rekt by

How is it pretty obvious for: Blitz, Ezreal, Ahri, Brand, Cho, Morgana?

pls explain

There are 23 Quadrillion blind pick matchups and you want me to explain why they're OP.

Do you want me to post the matchups and explain each matchups dynamics, and why these Champions are OP as a result but win rates mean very little with so many OP Champs mixing things up so go ignored?

No. Every champion is OP in their own right, and every champion has a counter. There are things you can do to prevent dying to them, it's not as if Riot makes champions to troll people and say "hahaha look at them, they can't do anything against them." I understand some champions are a pain/hassle to deal with, but you're saying a select few are OP? No. As stated before, every champion is OP in their own unique way, every champion is good at something another is not, and every champion lacks something another has. Learn to deal with it and have fun, otherwise don't play League. You can't go around saying "nerf this champion, nerf that about that specific champion" otherwise what's the incentive to play that champion?
remove his crystals and no one will play him for a while expect like 50 people.
Yorick is broken in a sense, he is just so underrated no one says anything

When versing Yorick:

1 look up guides on how to beat yorick for 30 minutes.
2 get flamed at for being afk and not going to lane.
3 complain Yorick is op and suffer with 20 min bans for being afk in game.

:(

How do you buff the unplayed Champions? You've got no statistics to base anything off.

All they do is nerf the powerhouses, and that doesn't make say an Ahri strong against an Azir it just brings down a powerhouse.

This isn't balancing.
